long_description: Built for the avid snowboarder, the men's Burton Rider's snowboard pack offers plenty of space for your hardware, gear and miscellaneous essentials. Padded shoulder harness, removable hipbelt and ergonomic back panel provide comfort for a long day of snow play. Vertical and horizontal carry options let you tote your own ride when venturing deep into backcountry zones or hiking where there are low-hanging branches. Easy-access internal shovel/probe pocket; fleece-lined goggles pocket; hipbelt pockets; side pockets for accessories or beverages. The men's Burton Rider's snowboard pack also includes a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately).
short_description: Built for the avid snowboarder, the men's Burton Rider's snowboard pack offers plenty of space for your hardware, gear and miscellaneous essentials.
